Album: Great Zeppelin - A Tribute to Led Zeppelin (Live)
Lyric:
[by:ĺłťćľŠ]

[00:54.75]There's a lady who's sure all that glitters is gold
[01:01.76][07:56.34]And she's buying a stairway to heaven
[01:08.80]When she gets there she knows, if the stores are all closed
[01:15.98]With a word she can get what she came for
[01:24.36]Ooh, ooh, and she's buying a stairway to heaven
[01:37.22]There's a sign on the wall but she wants to be sure
[01:43.47]'Cause you know sometimes words have two meanings
[01:50.53]In a tree by the brook, there's a songbird who sings
[01:57.85]Sometimes all of our thoughts are misgiven
[02:06.63][02:41.18][03:08.19][03:30.86][03:59.96][04:49.56][05:00.66][05:36.97][07:44.09][08:12.08] 
[02:22.31]Ooh, it makes me wonder
[02:32.00][03:25.68]Ooh, it really makes me wonder
[02:43.07]There's a feeling I get when I look to the west
[02:48.92]And my spirit is crying for leaving
[02:55.49]In my thoughts I have seen rings of smoke through the trees
[03:01.72]And the voices of those who standing looking
[03:15.91]It makes me wonder
[03:34.81]And it's whispered that soon if we all call the tune
[03:40.59]Then the piper will lead us to reason
[03:46.74]And a new day will dawn for those who stand long
[03:52.99]And the forests will echo with laughter
[04:26.91]If there's a bustle in your hedgerow, don't be alarmed now
[04:32.51]It's just a spring clean for the May queen
[04:38.64]Yes, there are two paths you can go by, but in the long run
[04:44.38]There's still time to change the road you're on
[04:57.06]And it makes me wonder
[05:14.79]Your head is humming and it won't go, in case you don't know
[05:20.26]The piper's calling you to join him
[05:25.83]Dear lady, can you hear the wind blow, and did you know
[05:31.39]Your stairway lies on the whispering wind
[06:52.78]And as we wind on down the road
[06:57.58]Our shadows taller than our soul
[07:02.27]There walks a lady we all know
[07:07.01]Who shines white light and wants to show
[07:11.73]How everything still turns to gold
[07:16.42]And if you listen very hard
[07:21.05]The tune will come to you at last
[07:25.76]When all are one and one is all
[07:30.35]To be a rock and not to roll
